comment: The user reported that he cannot log in into his profile because he lost his password. I helped him to create a new one
The user reported that he cannot find his profile. I created a new one with Active Directory
The user reported that he cannot connect to the internet. I did a reset of the DNS with the ipconfig /dnsflush command and then tested the connectivity with the ping command
The user reported that he cannot log to the manifacturer's CMS to download her payrolls. The problem is not resolved yet
